name: Designer Project File Template
description:
This template is for any new designer to quickly set up a template for their projects. With organised file structure and ready made layouts to begin working in and kick start your next job.

Contains:

📒 Cover page
Project thumbnail displaying project status, date and who is working on it.

ℹ️ About page
Information about the project such as any objective or hypothesis, links to relevant documents and snapshot of the team.

🖥 Designs 
With title card to display page name and status.

🕹 Prototype sections
For desktop and mobile with Index pages and a start screen to quickly link up your prototype.

📐 Redlines
For developer handover.

👨‍⚖️ Review section
 Example of a page with date to be used for any reviews of the design work.

Uses annotations by the mix panel team and documentation cards & buttons by Ramy Majouji
